info.headline: Tornado Warning issued July 26 at 4:35PM MDT until July 26 at 5:15PM MDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...A TORNADO WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 515 PM MDT FOR CENTRAL KIT CARSON COUNTY... At 434 PM MDT, a confirmed tornado was located over Vona, or 5 miles east of Seibert, moving southwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Damaging tornado and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Emergency management confirmed tornado. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. Locations impacted include... Vona. This includes Interstate 70 in Colorado between mile markers 410 and 413. TORNADO...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN
info.instruction: To repeat, a tornado is on the ground. TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
